SeekFallback.synopsis: NOTE: these lines should not be recorded.Fallback combat nodes for creatures (and other) when they are stuck or otherwise biding their time before making a move.

LookingForHiddenPlayer.synopsis: Spoken by an NPC on their turn in combat after the player has turned invisible or started sneaking.

CombatFallback.synopsis: NOTE: these lines should not be recorded.Fallback combat nodes for creatures (and other) when they are stuck or otherwise biding their time before making a move.
